pr_title: Log at lower level when moving file and file already exists

timeline.message:
Log at lower level when moving file and file already exists

No need to log at info level, this is not a filure and will happen
occasionally. Also minor change so that we log if deleting a file
fails.

timeline.bodyText: Consider catching the particular subclass of IOException thrown when the file already exists (FileAlreadyExistsException?), and only try deletion etc then.
timeline.author: hakonhall

replies.bodyText: If we fail to write to the file we need to cleanup (we append to the file, so if it fails we have no idea of what has been written). So the change is just logging if we were unable to delete the file, we always need to delete no matter what the IOException was.
replies.author: hmusum
